The best guide in the worst of times delivered in a sermon at the Guild-Hall Chappel on March 27, 1681 before the honourable the aldermen and several eminent citizens of the city of London / by William Orme ... Orme, William.
[8], 32, 21 p.
Printed for Samuel Carr ..., London : 1681.
Last 21 pages is a sermon on Revelation XIV, 13. Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
=======
